net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm
Interface MessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
Reporter, TransportBridgeBlock
public interface MessageHandler

Interface for objects which receive and inject messages into the transport mechanism.

messagesReceived

                      java.util.Vector msg)
Called when a message is received from a communications link.

msg - - Vector of messages received.
